playlist.title: Example XSPF playlist for the JW Player

track.title: Big Buck Bunny - MP3 Audio with thumb
track.creator: the Peach Open Movie Project
track.annotation: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation. Like the foundation's previous film Elephants Dream, the film is made using free and open source software.

track.title: Big Buck Bunny - FLV Video with captions
track.creator: the Peach Open Movie Project
track.annotation: Big Buck Bunny is a short animated film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation. Like the foundation's previous film Elephants Dream, the film is made using free and open source software.
